history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03467
FULL TITLE : THE REVISED ANTI-HAZING LAW
ABSTRACT : Aims to revise the Anti-Hazing Law by making all hazing illegal, expand the definition of hazing beyond incidences related to gaining membership in an organization, and open perpetrators up to civil and criminal liability.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : HERRERA-DY, BERNADETTE "BH" C.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
